title: Amazing Stories Volume 09 Number 09
creator: Sloane, Thomas O'Conor, 1851-1940
Campbell, John Wood, 1910-1971
Nathanson, Isaac R., 1882-1962
Preston, Robert Page
Van Dyke, Dix
Skidmore, Joseph William, 1890-1938
Chamberlain, Philip Dennis
description: Amazing Stories, volume 9, number 9 (January 1935). Scanned copy of a pulp magazine published by Teck Publications, Inc. and edited by Thomas O'Conor Sloane, Ph.D. Periodical copyright not renewed. Individual contributions' copyrights not renewed. This magazine and its contents are now in the public domain. Featuring: Conquest of the Planets (John W. Campbell, Jr.; 1/3), The World Aflame (Isaac R. Nathanson), Land of Twilight (Robert Page Preston; 3/3), The Radio (Dix Van Dyke), A Epos of Posi and Nega (Joe W. Skidmore), and The Tale of the Atom (Philip Dennis Chamberlain).
